definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: thrust, .push, drive ([[הֲדַף]] in Targum; Ar. hadafa is ingressus ad aliquem fuit, propinquus fuit, also of time prope accessit)—

thrust, push, subj. man, sq. acc. Nu 35:20, Nu 35:22 (here fatally); subj. cattle, fig. of men, Ez Eze 34:21 (instr. [[בְּכָתֵף]]; ‖[[נׇגַח]]); push away 2Ki 4:27 (Gehazi, the Shunammite); thrust away (fr. oneself) fig. = reject, [[הַוַּת רְשָׁעִים]] Pr 10:3 (subj. ´[[י]]).

thrust out, drive out, sq. [[מִן]] of place whence & acc. pers.; of ´[[י]] driving out enemies of Isr. fr. Canaan De 6:19, De 9:4, Jos 23:5; cf. also indef. subj. [[יֶהְדְּפֻהוּ מֵאוֹר אֶל־חשֶׁח]] Job 18:18 (‖[[וּמִתֵּבֵל יְנִדֻּהוּ]]); & Je 46:15 (where no pl. whence). Hence
= depose Is 22:19 of ´[[י]] deposing Shebna (sq. [[מִן]] of station).
